full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 692 Filed 11/22/21 Page 17 of 17

III. Conclusion

The Court therefore grants the Government's motion to preclude Dr. Hall's expert testimony. Because this is a preliminary pre-trial ruling, it is possible that facts and circumstances at trial would alter the Court's analysis. In that event, the Defense must re-raise its request to admit Dr. Hall as an expert witness.

SO ORDERED.

Dated: November 22, 2021
New York, New York

ALISON J. NATHAN
United States District Judge

17
DOJ-OGR-00011155
